settings.title: Smart Proximity Unlock
settings.intro: Auto-Unlock Your Bike When Approached, No Manual Passcode Needed
settings.notes: * The feature is upcoming and will be launched soon.

settings.title: Route Tracking & Real-Time Navigation
settings.intro: Featuring a detailed ride dashboard, our APP allows you to conveniently monitor various cycling metrics such as distance, speed, carbon reduction, and battery status at any time. With precise navigation powered by Mapbox, our app guides you to any destination you wish to explore, offering detailed route tracking and dynamic playback for an enhanced riding experience.

settings.title: Find My Bike
settings.intro:
Stay informed about your bike's movements with real-time location and route tracking.
The HORN guides you to your bike with ease through audible prompts.
settings.notes: * The feature is upcoming and will be launched soon.

settings.title: SOS Detection
settings.intro: In times of emergency, we're always by your side. Our SOS emergency system automatically detects accidents and offers swift rescue options, assisting you in contacting your pre-set emergency contacts when needed.
settings.notes: * The feature is upcoming and will be launched soon.

settings.title: Theft Alerts
settings.intro: Theft Alert: Our built-in sensor alarm system triggers an app notification in case of unauthorized movement, keeping your bike secure.
settings.notes: * The feature is upcoming and will be launched soon.

settings.title: Geofence Alert: Invisible Protection for Your Bike
settings.intro: Add an invisible shield of protection for your bike! Easily set and adjust safety zones with a simple tap. The onboard sensors keep you informed of any real-time movements in and out of the designated areas.
settings.notes: * The feature is upcoming and will be launched soon.

settings.title: Service Centers
settings.intro: Ensuring a Smooth and Worry-Free Ride

settings.title: Community: Connect and Share Your Ride
settings.intro: Engage in our vibrant community by posting, liking, and commenting. Share your cycling experiences and lifestyle, and find like-minded riders to connect with.
